org.drip.param.pricer
Class PricerParams

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.param.pricer.PricerParams

public class PricerParams
extends Serializer

Class contains the pricer parameters - the discrete unit size, calibration mode on/off, survival to pay/end date, and the discretization scheme

PricerParams

public PricerParams(int iUnitSize,
                    boolean bCalibMode,
                    boolean bSurvToPayDate,
                    int iDiscretizationScheme)
Creates the pricer parameters from the discrete unit size, calibration mode on/off, survival to pay/end date, and the discretization scheme

Parameters:
iUnitSize - Discretization Unit Size
bCalibMode - Calibration Mode On (True) Off (false)
bSurvToPayDate - Survival to Pay Date (True) or Period End Date (false)
iDiscretizationScheme - Discretization Scheme In Use
